prompts: Create a wolf-like Pokemon with sleek fur and sharp teeth, embodying darkness and mystery.
Design a fierce canine Pokemon that prowls the shadows, showcasing strength and agility.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that blends seamlessly into urban environments, with stealthy features.
Imagine a dark-type Pokemon with a striking black and white color palette, representing loyalty.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a pack hunter, with sharp claws and keen senses.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in forests and mountains, exuding a powerful, intimidating presence.
Give me a Pokemon that looks ready for battle with a fierce expression and defensive stance.
